channel.title: Abandoned Island on Brainsation
channel.description: Recent content in Abandoned Island on Brainsation

item.title: Disney Just Got Dark: The Hidden Island Park They Want To Keep Secret
item.description: A courageous photographer went deep undercover to show the grim truth behind the Disney parks. Little did we know that part of Disney’s magic is dark magic. Walt Disney himself has experienced his fair share of infamy. His anti-semitism is widely known, so it’s not surprising that even more secrets are right near the parks. The place commonly known as the “happiest place on Earth” may be the exact opposite for some people.
